value:
$WmMPID_パティ,ch06_37_Patty_F_Normal,Face|Ugh, are we there yet? This wagon
ride is so bumpy. My butt hurts!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Our destination should be visible as
soon as we crest this hill. I expect we
will arrive in the village by nightfall.$k$p$WmMPID_開花セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Bloom01,Face|I hope these supplies bring the
villagers some relief.$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|Um... That's strange. Are you all
seeing this?$k$p$WmMPID_ファバル,ch06_38_Fabal_M_Normal,Face|Seeing what?$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|Over the hill. It looks like smoke...$k$pIt is! Oh no, there's a fire in the
village! Several fires, by the look
of it!$k$p$WmMPID_開花セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Bloom01,Face|Are they under attack?$k$p$WmMPID_ファバル,ch06_38_Fabal_M_Normal,Face|Could be bandits. We had best hurry
down there!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_パティ,ch06_37_Patty_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Take this—hyah! And get lost!$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|Hah! You will not set one foot inside
this village while I'm here!$k$p$WmMPID_ファバル,ch06_38_Fabal_M_Normal,Face|It seems we've managed to drive
them back for now.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|And the village does not appear to
have sustained more serious damage.
What a relief we arrived in time...$k$p$WmMPID_開花セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Bloom01,Face|The fires have all been put out.$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|I regret to interrupt the celebration,
but I followed the bandits' retreat
path from the sky, and...it's troubling.$k$pThe ones we fought off were merely
scouts. The main force is encamped
on the other side of the hill!$k$p$WmMPID_ファバル,ch06_38_Fabal_M_Normal,Face|Then they will be back. And soon.$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|We cannot defend against them
without reinforcements!$k$p$WmMPID_パティ,ch06_37_Patty_F_Normal,Face|What do we do?! Is there time to
evacuate the villagers?$k$p$WmMPID_開花セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Bloom01,Face|Everyone, remain calm.$k$p$WmMPID_フィー,ch06_36_Fee_F_Normal,Face|Right—of course, Ced.$k$p$WmMPID_開花セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Bloom01,Face|Fee, I want you to fly to the Order of
Heroes as fast as you can and find us
some reinforcements.$k$pThe rest of us will hole up here and
fortify the village defenses.$k$p
